title: Ping issues every other game
body: every other game it goes from a 40-80 ping all game to a 200-500 ping all game, every other game its really unplayable and irritating.{{champion:105}}

replies.body:
Just to confirm and clarify, are you using Time Warner Cable at all?  There was some reported issues earlier this afternoon that should be fully resolved at this point.

Give me a heads up if your issues persist!
thanks for responding, i fixed the problem it had something to do with windows firewall, i turned firewall off and now i run even lower ping then i ever have

Hello, I don't like butting in on a topic but because of the lack of attention these issues are getting I feel like I need to!

I am with Time Warner in the NY area and I can assure you I've had issues for a long time, before this afternoon's issues which did not seem to affect my area nor my League experience. Even after maintenance, the issue with League specifically is not fixed. I dunno if you have any meaningful contact with TWC, but my tracerts show that there are huge spikes along the route to the Chicago servers, I dunno whose end the problem is on.

Both Riot and TWC have pointed fingers at the other side every time I've contacted both, I just want the information to get to anyone who might be able to help!
